verbs.description: [ARG0: The Showtime documentary The Fourth Estate] [V: does] [ARG1: a great job of living inside the New York Times] [ARGM-TMP: during the first year of the Trump administration] , but that approach falters when it comes to the paper ’s own # MeToo scandal .
